pages.text: To get started with Real Filing Reborn, you'll first need to craft some basic components:$(br2)$(li)Filing Folders - for storing items$(li)Filing Cabinet - for holding folders$(li)Index Cards - for networking cabinets$(li)Filing Index - for connecting multiple cabinets to a network

The $(item)Filing Folder$() is the foundation of your storage system. Each folder can store billions of a single item type.$(br2)To use a folder, craft it and then right-click while holding the item you want to store in your off-hand.$(br2)To extract items from folders, shift-right-click a folder in your main hand.
The $(item)Filing Cabinet$() can hold up to 12 folders. Insert folders by right-clicking on the cabinet with a folder, or shift-right-click to open the cabinet GUI.
